Articles.Content: Ok since the SAS update the ASAS part has simply become a heavier SAS, yet still has the same torque. I'm simply suggesting that its torque is made to be higher than the regular SAS part to match up with it being heavier. This way people would consider using it again.

It's only there as a grandfather clause, so old craft files from before the SAS change can use the same part.

I'm all for balancing them out, though. Why is the larger one also lighter?
I think that the ASAS could easily be rebalanced as the heavier and stronger version of the SAS. Its not exactly a major tweak.
